name: godotobile
description:
Hi . welcome.

the name of the game is godotobile . it is [ Godot + Automobile ] . godot is the name of an awesome game engine . i created this car based on godot game engine's logo . 

the game is not playable yet. i'm building this game after my job at evenings. so the progress may be slow . 

i designed and 3d modeled the car in blender , and i am of course using godot game engine to build the game . 

textures from texturelib.com.

please comment! thank you.
